website_summaries.verdict: A very affordable option for a simple, multi-purpose soft rack for surfboards and other seasonal toys.
pros: Small padding is aerodynamically shaped for a quieter road experience when strapped to the top of a moving vehicle
Can haul winter gear like snowboards as well
cons: Requires existing roof rack to cover
Some rack bars may be too thick to secure the padding on tightly

customer_reviews.title: Keep your Board like New
customer_reviews.text: Those who have complained about spinning around on their racks must have round or square crossbars. These pads are a perfect fit for the oval OEM crossbars on our Lexus RX. Tearing the Velcro off for removal is a challenge, but worth knowing that they would otherwise stay on. These cushions are rather firm and allow me to cinch down my board with a more even pressure across its width. Otherwise the curve of our crossbars would make contact only in the middle of the board. Though my board is wider than the cushions, it really doesn't matter because they create a good inch of clearance when cinched down.
customer_reviews.author: Shortygeorge

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Toyota Rav
customer_reviews.text: Fits my toyota rav roof crossbars perfectly. Well made, velcro strong and seems very secure when on car. Look forward to getting my kayak and trying these out for the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Reisha Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Ok but looks faded soon
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for about 18 months. I live in San Diego and they have seen a lot of use. The fabric faded dramatically within about 6 months and the seams are beginning to break down but they are still serviceable for now. I am getting ready to replace them with something else, possibly the Dakine pads. If you cannot afford a few extra bucks, or only need them for a short period of time they are fine. Otherwise I recommend trying a different pad.
customer_reviews.author: HowarthFam

customer_reviews.title: They work great, they don't slip around
customer_reviews.text: I paddle board frequently and wanted something that would mount to my roof rack. These mount to the roof rack with velcro. They work great, they don't slip around. I take them off every time I'm done, so I can't attest to how they hold up in the weather for long periods of time. They are very sturdy and they work great for my paddlebords.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Holt

customer_reviews.title: Modification may be needed!
customer_reviews.text: I like these but some modification will be needed. They are too loose fitting around my Ford Explorer crossbars. The Velcro is very strong though and they serve their purpose. Definitely check your load after a few miles. On a side note the packaging was interesting...they look like they’d been returned and left in it’s first shipping box(that was in really rough shape) and just shoved in another box to ship to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cushions
customer_reviews.text: I've added these to the transverse pieces of my car's roof rack to transport an SUP from my house to the beach. The length of the pads is fine for my 30" wide board. The Velcro fasteners are sufficiently sturdy. Because of the sticky nature of Velcro it was a bit difficult to neatly position the cushions around the metal bars. However, with patience, I eventually got them settled to my satisfaction. We'll see how these stand up to weather. So far I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit Rhino Rack
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but does not fit well on my Rhino-Rack Vortex Aero Cross Bars. There just isn't enough material on the pads to wrap around the entire bar and connect the velcro. So beware if you have larger bars.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A Redding

customer_reviews.title: Barely wraps around my INNO aero bars
customer_reviews.text: I bought an INNO rail set. The velcro was barely able to overlap the mating velcro on the other side. I returned these and purchased Swagman pads instead. They fit better on the my INNO rails.
customer_reviews.author: Madison, WI

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I have a custom made truck rack that is made out of 2" tubing. These pads fit perfectly over the tubing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Constructed, Excellent Velcro, Good Padding
customer_reviews.text: These pads fit very securely on the crossbars of my SUV's roof rack and allow me to carry things like our stand-up paddle boards (SUPs) safely without damage. They have a full-length Velcro attachment strip. No way they are going to blow off. They could be longer so the reach farther across the roof rack, but they work
customer_reviews.author: Dan KobloshTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed with this product or Dorsal!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these Rack Pads before and I will order them again. The length and fit to my rack is perfect for all types of cargo and the look is great! The Dorsal company is easy to deal with and they are proud of their product. Dorsal will stand behind their quality product. Order these Dorsal Rack Pads and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Skridd

customer_reviews.title: Great Value For the Money
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on my aero-style crossbars. Easy on & off Velcro strip along the length if the pads. Stays secure to the bar at Interstate speeds. Good quality covering material should last several years.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't found a better one. There are many choices out there. Minor fraying of the exterior seam but if I get a couple of seasons out of this, I will be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ret. Lt. Col. A.D

customer_reviews.title: Worked well on my Subaru
customer_reviews.text: Great product, used on my Subaru Outback and the quality is great and at a great value. Would recommend to everyone. I used it for my paddle board and kayak. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Brent Guyer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Required rework for my application
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product but I used it on a 2016 Tahoe and it slid around the cross post after a long trip. It is made to fit any rail and mine were 1 1/2" oval. I ended up sewing it 1/2" over lap on each side and it works nice and tight now.
customer_reviews.author: John In HB

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfect. This padding will even fit a 1" deep ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2015 Tahoe, with a roof rack 3"wide and 1/2" deep. It fits perfect. This padding will even fit a 1" deep rail. It is for a flat rail, not a round rail, so that's why I think it spins for other people. The velcro is strong. The construction is sturdy and the price is excellent. It holds my 12.5 x 31.5" sup well. I have no issues and love the price for something that works well
customer_reviews.author: Mark T

customer_reviews.title: love it, perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it, has worked great for strapping down my paddle board to the roof of my car. Durable & well made. No flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Teshia

customer_reviews.title: Cures whistling
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to silence the whistling of bare Thule cross bars, which are silent with kayak cradles in place. Mission accomplished nice and quiet without extras cradles on roof. The pads seemed a little loose on the thin Thule bars so zip tied them in place as well. Probably not necessary but they won’t come off now.
customer_reviews.author: Maxonian

customer_reviews.title: Could not use Velcro
customer_reviews.text: Gave these pads only 3 stars because I could not secure them with the Velcro. If they fit 8" circumference bars the Velcro must just be barely catching. Really? They could not add a couple more inches of material? Will have to tie them down.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Work great and last long
customer_reviews.text: I use two of them in one rack bar to carry a dinghy boat (Laser). They stay in place (with or without carrying something - strong Velcro), color stays nice, good quality in all aspects. Close to two years, many long and short trips and still working and (almost) looking like the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Escudero

customer_reviews.title: Great price... great product.
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are great. Have had them on my jeep grand Cherokee for 2 months now... haven't moved a inch. Padding is great for my long board.
customer_reviews.author: brad w

customer_reviews.title: Made well, slightly bigger than I'd expected. Also ...
customer_reviews.text: Made well, slightly bigger than I'd expected. Also move around quite a bit on the roof rack whilst in transit.
customer_reviews.author: rgd86

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit Thule Aeroblade crossbars great. Velcro strap is wide and should stay secure.
customer_reviews.author: MRMills

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Wide enough for your stand up, or long board. Lots of cushion for my board.
customer_reviews.author: Bingomech

customer_reviews.title: Bad construction weak product
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok but it won’t last materials are weak and look like they sowed by hand. Bad construction
customer_reviews.author: Justino

customer_reviews.title: Just received one
customer_reviews.text: The image and description shows two, but in the mail I just received one. I asked for a refund immediately
customer_reviews.author: Emilia

customer_reviews.title: velcro is heavy which is a good thing - once these are on
customer_reviews.text: velcro is heavy which is a good thing - once these are on, they aren't going anywhere. does look a lot like a billboard as the Dorsal text is on both sides of each pad. don't exactly love that, but seems the pads all come this way.
customer_reviews.author: mandy cousins

customer_reviews.title: does not fit
customer_reviews.text: Tried this on two sets of cross bars. Will not surround them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Won’t Stay Positioned Correctly, flip over when SUPs are loaded
customer_reviews.text: Constantly turn over when we place our SUPS onto our Thule rack system. Our cross bars are square and it’s very difficult to get the Velcro enclosures right enough to prevent the pads from turning over. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Vinnola Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Attach well on the racks, good support for my SUP
customer_reviews.author: udibd

customer_reviews.title: All good
customer_reviews.text: My husband put them on my Jeep and they look great! Haven’t put my board on it yet, but I’m sure it’ll be fine!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Dow Himstedt

customer_reviews.title: Works well despite loose fitting
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit snugly on my Subaru crossbars. However I find my paddleboards are secured better and make less noise while traveling on the freeway. I didn't plan on keeping them on 24/7, so the product works fine enough for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great after a slight modification for square racks!
customer_reviews.text: I have a square rack type on my car but I just added some insulation sleeves before adding the pads and it works great! I used it all summer with one or two SUPs on in and hade no issue!
customer_reviews.author: Vasilis Vam 3

customer_reviews.title: Love these pads.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my girlfriend and she loves them. She slides her board on from the rear of her car and they make it much easier for her vs. the bare rails. They are very secure with a wide velcro strip along the full length.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Holds tight with extra strong velcro.
customer_reviews.text: The velcro is VERY secure. A wide strip runs the entire length, and is extra heavy duty. A great solution for me.
customer_reviews.author: John Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, simple and functional
customer_reviews.text: Shipped and arrived quickly and on quoted time. These pads work great if the car has cross bars.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Good, strong velcro never falls off
customer_reviews.text: Good, strong velcro never falls off, I leave them on full-time. Only problem is the sun is fading them, so they are not UV proof, but I guess they don't claim to be. that'd be cool if they were though! Other than that work great for my SUP.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Ball

customer_reviews.title: Great product for kayaks and boards
customer_reviews.text: Great product for kayaks and boards. Easy on and off. Make sure your roof rack has oval or wide cross bars. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Thule Blades
customer_reviews.text: Save your time if you have Thule aero blades. They don't fit.
customer_reviews.author: james lumley

customer_reviews.title: I'm Happy
customer_reviews.text: I had to modify the pieces to fit my '01 Explorer, but that was nothing. Well made and a huge band of Velcro!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Miller

customer_reviews.title: Used on my 2019 Ford Escape cross bars to hold 11ft SUP board. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Used on my 2019 Ford Escape cross bars to hold 11ft SUP board. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey L

customer_reviews.title: and were EXCEPTIONALLY nice. 2) If you purchase these pads
customer_reviews.text: A little on the smallish side (not very robust looking) to be XL, and the jury is still out as to whether I trust my kayak riding on them. BUT, a surfboard - without hesitation. Two things I want to point out (the first of which makes this a 5-star purchase): 1) Customer service. They responded almost immediately to my purchase and questions, and were EXCEPTIONALLY nice. 2) If you purchase these pads, no matter what your purchase invoice states, you WILL get a pair (2) rack pads.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrold

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 2019 Rav4 perfectly. Very easy to install and uninstall. Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Joey S.

customer_reviews.title: Great rack pads
customer_reviews.text: Great rack pads! Very well made! My aero racks are 3" wide, and 1" thick. These pads fit perfectly with enough adjustment left to fit racks thicker and wider (or thinner and narrower) than mine.
customer_reviews.author: George C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and easy to install. The padding does slide around but is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Works as Designed
customer_reviews.text: Attached to roof crossbars to support stand up paddleboards. Works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: These do what they are supposed to and fit racks on my Explorer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy them...with your money
customer_reviews.text: Simple in design, simple in use. You Velcro these pads onto your roof rack or carrier and it keeps your board from getting scratched up. Cheap, simple, decent shipping time.
customer_reviews.author: The Penismightier

customer_reviews.title: Allowed Kayak on Honda Odyssey
customer_reviews.text: Fit fine on a 2006 Honda Odyssey van with factory roof rack. Velcro, so easy to put on/take off. With straps, able to hold down kayak good enough for interstate speeds.
customer_reviews.author: PMM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Mdx
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for Acura mdx 2010- 2013 model Very nice part
customer_reviews.author: Marino Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works great for 30’ SUP board
customer_reviews.text: Fit fine Well made Should use tie down straps for extra security
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L.

customer_reviews.title: Fits good!
customer_reviews.text: to early to tell how durable it really is.! That's why I gave the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LAS

customer_reviews.title: Great but need smaller logo.
customer_reviews.text: Initial reaction: These look and feel great! Sturdy and the padding feels strong. My only complaint is the huge logo. My DYI fix was to use permanent black marker (as seen in picture) to black out the logo and to give it a more sleek look. I will update once I install them!
customer_reviews.author: Mitty Mohon

customer_reviews.title: Functional but fades to the elements.
customer_reviews.text: Looks faded within weeks of exposed to the elements, but functional.
customer_reviews.author: Runner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit! I stack three boards on top but easily big enough for my kayak as well!
customer_reviews.author: Chase K.

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t actually used it yet, but the quality is good and don’t see any issues coming. Seems to be just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Subaru crosstrek perfectly ! Can’t wait to put it to use.
customer_reviews.author: kris nelson

customer_reviews.title: prob not
customer_reviews.text: Pads appear to be used and show signs of wear, also do not fit well on roof racks and are too long with extra Velcro past Velcro seams.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Tschimperle

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit 10 inch circumstance.
customer_reviews.text: Nice pads except that they were a little too small for my bars. My fault. I thought they would fit. I just used velcro to secure them.
customer_reviews.author: Vince S.

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: I purchased six for my rack then bolted them down I want to keep all six.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Dellacasa

customer_reviews.title: Great for canoe/kayak!
customer_reviews.text: This works great with a 3 person canoe on a 07 Subaru Outback. Perfect to help protect expensive roof bars. These were the longest (wouldn't fit if they were any longer) I could find and at a very reasonable price. Thanks dorsal!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Fits wide aero bars very nicely & the Velcro is very secure. Solid construction, so expect them to be durable and last a long time. Product is exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: bmarchal

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was seeking!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for either my SUP or kayak. I have now used it for both.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Loughran

customer_reviews.title: Fits good
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed to transport our surfboard to the beach
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the pads they are perfect for my carbon fiber board
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Pereira

customer_reviews.title: exactly as advertised. Works well with flat bar roof ...
customer_reviews.text: exactly as advertised. Works well with flat bar roof and pick up truck bed rails.
customer_reviews.author: GRC1973

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: You are better off using 2 pool noodles and duck tape. Why is this 30 dollars? This is just two pieces of foam
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Good but logos are quite large
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product so far. I installed wood cross-beam racks to my 57 Chevy wagon. I will get the measurements for you guys but in the mean time they fit perfectly and look pretty decent. Since the pads are very long the logos are actually quite large (front AND back if you were wondering). I just generally hate being a rolling advertisement, so I wish they were more unobtrusive. It's not a well known brand so at least it's not like I'm trying to be some sort of brand tramp. The Chevy is always garaged so I won't really be putting these to any tests of the elements. Good buy for the price, thanks Dorsal.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P Savage

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you smooth out the velcro.
customer_reviews.text: Product looks as good as I imagined it to look on my care!
customer_reviews.author: Jamina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit on our crossbars!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our Acura MDX cross bars which are apx 3-4 inches wide. They fit nice and tight and the Velcro is super strong. Excellent value at a low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Janet P.

customer_reviews.title: Meh, ok.
customer_reviews.text: They are ok for Kayaks, problem with them is the slip forward when you put the kayak on top, no matter how well you get the Velcro lined up. My last lot (Cylindrical shape) were much better, ill be buying that type again when these need replacing, which hopefully will be soon.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Fox

customer_reviews.title: Wanted it to work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit my cross bars. It slips around. Pool noodles work better for us.
customer_reviews.author: nevans

customer_reviews.title: Slides on cross bars
customer_reviews.text: Even though it said it works on factory bars, it is too big on standard Subaru Outback crossbars. The velcro does not wrap around far enough and they slide side to side. Very poor design and it's too late for me to send them back now.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in CT

customer_reviews.title: Pads spin. Padding does not stay between kayak and ...
customer_reviews.text: Pads spin. Padding does not stay between kayak and rack. Causes kayak to loosen.
customer_reviews.author: P Hudak

customer_reviews.title: Good performance for value
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I'm just about to take mine off the racks for winter, I left them up there all season. No issues
customer_reviews.author: MissMel

product_meta.title: DORSAL Aero Crossbar Roof Rack Pads for Car Surfboard Kayak SUP Snowboard Racks 28 Inch Long [Pair]
product_meta.description: Our CrossBar pads combine security and protection with a soft foam core and an durable woven nylon material over the eintire surface that ensures long life of the pad. Durable hook and loop closures are designed to secure around roof rack attachment points and accessories to get a more customized fit for your vehicle.
feature_bullets: Long lasting performance with durable 600D nylon construction with UV resistance
Easy on and off with hook and loop closure design along bottom of pads
Surfboards SUPs and boats are well protected during transport with these high density foam core pads
Integrated no-slip top construction pads keeps loads in place
To be used with Dorsal load straps or Locking Straps (sold separately)
